title: US delivers tough warning to Pakistan’s General Asim Munir - Time's up, get ready for sanctions
description: Washington faces a sharp break with Islamabad as 44 U.S. lawmakers warn Pakistan’s Army Chief Gen. Asim Munir of looming Global Magnitsky sanctions. They cite abductions of journalist Ahmed Noorani’s family, the kidnapping of Salman Ahmad’s relatives, civilia…
content: 44 bipartisan U.S. Congress members, led by Representatives Pramila Jayapal and Greg Casar, sent a letter on December 3, 2025, to Secretary of State Marco Rubio urging sanctions against Pakistan's Ch… [+8563 chars]
